00034 void KMCApplication::Initialize() {
00035     Application::Initialize();
00036     //KMCCalculatorFactory::RegisterAll();
00037     AddProgramOptions()
00038             ("options,o", boost::program_options::value<string>(), "  program and calculator options")
00039             ("file,f", boost::program_options::value<string>(), "  sqlite state file");
00040 
00041     AddProgramOptions("Calculators")
00042             ("execute,e", boost::program_options::value<string>(), "list of calculators separated by commas or spaces")
00043             ("list,l", "lists all available calculators")
00044             ("description,d", boost::program_options::value<string>(), "detailed description of a calculator");
00045 }
00046 
00047 void KMCApplication::ShowHelpText(std::ostream &out)
00048 {
00049     string name =  ProgramName();
00050     if(VersionString() != "")
00051          name = name + ", version " + VersionString();
00052 
00054     HelpText(out);
00055     out << "\n\n" << OptionsDesc() << endl;
00056 }
00057 
00058 
00059 // outputs options from the XML file
00060 bool KMCApplication::EvaluateOptions() {
00061 
00062         if(OptionsMap().count("list")) {
00063             cout << "Available calculators: \n";
00064             for(KMCCalculatorFactory::assoc_map::const_iterator iter=Calculators().getObjects().begin();
00065                     iter != Calculators().getObjects().end(); ++iter) {
00066                 PrintDescription( (iter->first).c_str(), _short );
00067             }
00068             StopExecution();
00069             return true;
00070         }
00071 
00072 
00073          if(OptionsMap().count("description")) {
00074             CheckRequired("description", "no calculator is given");
00075             Tokenizer tok(OptionsMap()["description"].as<string>(), " ,\n\t");
00076             // loop over the names in the description string
00077             for (Tokenizer::iterator n = tok.begin(); n != tok.end(); ++n) {
00078                 // loop over calculators
00079                 bool printerror = true;
00080                 for(KMCCalculatorFactory::assoc_map::const_iterator iter=Calculators().getObjects().begin();
00081                         iter != Calculators().getObjects().end(); ++iter) {
00082 
00083                     if ( (*n).compare( (iter->first).c_str() ) == 0 ) {
00084                          PrintDescription( (iter->first).c_str(), _long );
00085                         printerror = false;
00086                         break;
00087                     }
00088                  }
00089                  if ( printerror ) cout << "Calculator " << *n << " does not exist\n";
00090             }
00091             StopExecution();
00092             return true;
00093          }
00094 
00095         Application::EvaluateOptions();
00096         CheckRequired("execute", "no calculator is given");
00097 
00098         Tokenizer tok(OptionsMap()["execute"].as<string>(), " ,\n\t");
00099         for (Tokenizer::iterator n = tok.begin(); n != tok.end(); ++n)
00100             AddCalculator(Calculators().Create((*n).c_str()));
00101         return true;
00102     }
00103 
00104 
00105 void KMCApplication::PrintDescription(const char *name, const bool length) {
00106         // loading the documentation xml file from VOTCASHARE
00107         char *votca_share = getenv("VOTCASHARE");
00108         if(votca_share == NULL) throw std::runtime_error("VOTCASHARE not set, cannot open help files.");
00109         string xmlFile = string(getenv("VOTCASHARE")) + string("/kmc/xml/")+name+string(".xml");
00110         try {
00111             Property options;
00112             load_property_from_xml(options, xmlFile);
00113 
00114            if ( length ) { // short description of the calculator
00115 
00116                  cout << string("  ") << _fwstring(string(name),14);
00117                  cout << options.get(name+string(".description")).as<string>();
00118 
00119             } else { // long description of the calculator
00120                 cout << " " << _fwstring(string(name),18);
00121                 cout << options.get(name+string(".description")).as<string>() << endl;
00122 
00123                 list<Property *> items = options.Select(name+string(".item"));
00124 
00125                 for(list<Property*>::iterator iter = items.begin(); iter!=items.end(); ++iter) {
00126                     //cout << "Long description" << endl;
00127                     Property *pname=&( (*iter)->get( string("name") ) );
00128                     Property *pdesc=&( (*iter)->get( string("description") ) );
00129                     //Property *pdflt=&( (*iter)->get( string("default") ) );
00130                     if ( ! (pname->value()).empty() ) {
00131                         cout << string("  -") << _fwstring(pname->value(), 14);
00132                         cout << pdesc->value() << endl;
00133                     }
00134                  }
00135             }
00136             cout << endl;
00137         } catch(std::exception &error) {
00138             cout << string("XML file or description tag missing: ") << xmlFile;
00139         }
00140     }
00141 
00142 void KMCApplication::AddCalculator(KMCCalculator* calculator){
00143         _calculators.push_back(calculator);
00144 }
